original: I wake up at seven every morning.
slashSplit: I wake up / at seven every morning.
parenSplit: I wake up <at seven> every morning.
vocabularySplit: + I / + wake up / + at seven / + every morning / .

original: First, I brush my teeth and wash my face.
slashSplit: First, / I brush my teeth / and wash my face.
parenSplit: First, I brush my teeth and wash my face.
vocabularySplit: + First / , / + I / + brush / + my / + teeth / + and / + wash / + my / + face / .

original: Then I eat breakfast with my family.
slashSplit: Then I eat breakfast / with my family.
parenSplit: Then I eat breakfast <with my family>.
vocabularySplit: + Then / + I / + eat / + breakfast / + with my family / .

original: I usually have toast and juice.
slashSplit: I usually have toast / and juice.
parenSplit: I usually have toast and juice.
vocabularySplit: + I / + usually / + have / + toast / + and / + juice / .

original: After breakfast, I get my bag ready.
slashSplit: After breakfast, / I get my bag ready.
parenSplit: <After breakfast>, I get my bag ready.
vocabularySplit: + After breakfast / , / + I / + get / + my / + bag / + ready / .

original: I check homework and put books inside.
slashSplit: I check homework / and put books inside.
parenSplit: I check homework and put books inside.
vocabularySplit: + I / + check / + homework / + and / + put / + books / + inside / .

original: Finally, I walk to school with friends.
slashSplit: Finally, / I walk / to school / with friends.
vocabularySplit: + Finally / , / + I / + walk / + to school / + with friends / .
